pageContext.claim: “When you give a crazed, crying lowlife a break, and give her a job at the White House, I guess it just didn’t work out. Good work by General Kelly for quickly firing that dog!”
pageContext.analysis: Omarosa Manigault Newman appeared on multiple seasons of the reality television show "The Apprentice" that Trump hosted. She joined his presidential campaign and worked on his transition team. Trump's opinion of her may have changed since she released her memoir but suggesting he gave "a crazed, crying lowlife a break" is a stretch. He hired her at several points since 2004 when she first appeared on "The Apprentice."
